item.title: Robert Musil - The Man Without Qualities
item.author: gupta.karan.11@gmail.com (Karan Gupta)
item.description: The Man Without Qualities by Robert Musil My rating: 3 of 5 stars I don’t quite remember how I had come across this book but I think it was through a reference in another. Anyway, the title was quite interesting and I picked it bought it in my kindle library. I picked it up while I was backpacking and while I had intended to complete the book in the duration, it was not to be so.

item.title: Hermann Hesse - Demian
item.author: gupta.karan.11@gmail.com (Karan Gupta)
item.description: Demian by Hemann Hesse My rating: 4 of 5 stars In a recent cleaning exercise, out of the recesses of old bookshelves, came out this beauty. It had been a while since I had taken up a paperback and my current read, “The Man Without Qualities” seemed to be going nowhere. Since this seemed like a book that I could be done with a a few days, I decided to make it an interim read.
